payload.content: ARK Invest's Chief Futurist Brett Winton believes the perception of the AI trade as a bubble is "flat wrong."

name: ARK Invest's Chief Futurist Brett Winton believes the perception of the AI trade
content: ARK Invest's Chief Futurist Brett Winton believes the perception of the AI trade as a bubble is "flat wrong."

payload.content: Brett Winton predicts that productivity gains from AI tools like ChatGPT are expected to "triple over the course of this year and then triple again," leading to a compound increase in pricing power of 40 to 50 times.

name: Brett Winton predicts that productivity gains from AI tools like ChatGPT are exp
content: Brett Winton predicts that productivity gains from AI tools like ChatGPT are expected to "triple over the course of this year and then triple again," leading to a compound increase in pricing power of 40 to 50 times.

payload.content: Brett Winton argues that current revenue projections for AI companies are "conservative relative to the pricing power that they have."

name: Brett Winton argues that current revenue projections for AI companies are "conse
content: Brett Winton argues that current revenue projections for AI companies are "conservative relative to the pricing power that they have."

payload.content: Brett Winton believes the massive data center CapEx spending seen today is justified.

content: Brett Winton believes the massive data center CapEx spending seen today is justified.

payload.content: Brett Winton holds a contrarian view that Wall Street "underestimates how valuable cures are" because it prefers recurring revenue models.

content: Brett Winton holds a contrarian view that Wall Street "underestimates how valuable cures are" because it prefers recurring revenue models.
